Description:
The FHIR Procedure resource defines an activity performed on or with a patient as part of the provision of care. It corresponds with surgeries and procedures performed, including endoscopies and biopsies, as well as less invasive actions like counseling and physiotherapy.

This resource is designed for a high-level summarization around the occurrence of a procedure, and not for specific procedure log documentation - a concept that does not yet have a defined FHIR Resource. When searching, only completed procedures are returned.

A user or staff member accessing this FHIR resource must have security to view orders, results, and procedure reports.

A MyChart user accessing this FHIR resource must be authorized to view procedures in MyChart.

category.Name: category
category.Description: A code that classifies the procedure. This will always be SNOMED code 103693007 (Diagnostic procedure) for the Procedure (Orders) resource.

date.Name: date
date.Description: Date or period that the procedure was performed, using the FHIR date parameter format.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Optional: Either subject or patient must be specified. If both are specified, they must reference the same patient.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Optional: Either subject or patient must be specified. If both are specified, they must reference the same patient.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

bodySite.Name: bodySite
bodySite.Description: Procedure operative region for all panels.

category.Name: category
category.Description: A code that classifies the procedure. This will always be SNOMED code 103693007 (Diagnostic procedure) for the Procedure (Orders) resource.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: Reference to an Encounter resource associated with the Procedure.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: System-specific ID for the procedure order record.

outcome.Name: outcome
outcome.Description: Discharge disposition from the linked ADT contact.

performedPeriod.Name: performedPeriod
performedPeriod.Description: The length of time the procedure was performed.

actor.Name: actor
actor.Description: The reading physicians or, if unavailable, the resulting physician.

reasonCode.Name: reasonCode
reasonCode.Description: External codes for diagnosis records associated with the procedure.

report.Name: report
report.Description: Reference to the diagnostic report resource.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The status of the Procedure.

API Value FHIR Event Status
cancelled stopped
active in-progress
completed completed
aborted stopped

*Note: Omitted FHIR event status equivalent values are not returned by this search

statusReason.Name: statusReason
statusReason.Description: The reason that a procedure was not performed, which is sent only when the status is Stopped.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The Patient FHIR ID for whom this Procedure resource is relevant.

total.Name: total
total.Description: Total number of resources that matched the search criteria.
